channel.title: CVE Feed for ua-parser -- uap-core
channel.description: The latest CVEs for ua-parser -- uap-core

item.title: CVE-2021-21317|2024-08-03T18:09:15.054Z -- ua-parser -- uap-core
item.description: uap-core in an open-source npm package which contains the core of BrowserScope's original user agent string parser. In uap-core before version 0.11.0, some regexes are vulnerable to regular expression denial of service (REDoS) due to overlapping capture groups. This allows remote attackers to overload a server by setting the User-Agent header in an HTTP(S) request to maliciously crafted long strings. This is fixed in version 0.11.0. Downstream packages such as uap-python, uap-ruby etc which depend upon uap-core follow different version schemes.
